name: Mushroomancy
description:
Grow mushrooms! Create monstrosities! Take over the world! 

7 Step Guide to World Domination through Mushroom Necromancy!

  1. Select an animal from your corpse storage on the top left
  2. Drop it in your mushroom tub by clicking
  3. Drop a mushroom spore on top
  4. Wait for the mycelium to grow
  5. Click on the mushroom to harvest
  6. Admire your horrific creation! Your new minion will go out and capture more animals before it succumbs.
  7. Repeat!

 Collecting more bodies fills up your world domination meter until you've overtaken the world!

Things we would've done with more time:

  1. Better UI layout
  2. Older particles are more powerful
  3. More creatures!
  4. Actual tutorial

Game Design: shotmaster, nebulos

Code: shotmaster, nebulos

Art: nebulos

All assets and code were created during the game jam with this template: https://github.com/NiklasEi/bevy_game_template
